amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to decrease $18,168,000 from the Management Directorate operations and support and to increase $18,168,000 for FEMA operations and support for the National Urban Search and Rescue Response System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
